# UITitlebarSeparatorStyle.line

**Case**

A style indicating that the title bar separator is a line.

## Declaration

```swift
case line
```

## Styles

- **UITitlebarSeparatorStyle.automatic**: A style indicating that the system determines the type of separator.
- **UITitlebarSeparatorStyle.none**: A style indicating that there’s no title bar separator.
- **UITitlebarSeparatorStyle.shadow**: A style indicating that the title bar separator is a shadow.
